text: The Australia national futsal team nicknamed the Futsalroos represents Australia in international futsal. They have appeared at the FIFA Futsal World Cup, OFC Futsal Nations Cup and AFC Futsal Championship. ==Competitive record== ===FIFA Futsal World Cup=== FIFA Futsal World Cup record Year Result Position 1989 1st round 11th 3 1 1 1 6 8 1992 1st round 12th 3 1 0 2 9 11 1996 1st round 15th 3 0 0 3 4 26 2000 1st round 15th 3 0 0 3 3 22 2004 1st round 15th 3 0 0 3 2 18 2008 did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify 2012 Group stage 20th 3 1 0 2 5 17 2016 Group stage 18th 3 1 0 2 5 16 2020 did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify 2024 did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify Total 7/10 0 Titles 21 4 1 16 34 118 ===OFC Futsal Championship=== OFC Futsal Championship record Year Result Position 1992 Champion 1st 4 4 0 0 28 6 1996 Champion 1st 6 6 0 0 69 8 1999 Champion 1st 6 6 0 0 41 4 2004 Champion 1st 5 5 0 0 20 0 2013^ Champion 1st 5 5 0 0 24 2 Total 5/5 5 Titles 26 26 0 0 182 20 ^Australia was no longer part of the OFC.
